title: Energy Sustainability and Gamification: MOOC-Based Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Interactive learning environment combining energy sustainability core concepts with gamification strategies for high school and university students preparing for professional careers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and societal impacts of renewable energy systems
Learners can achieve over 15% higher course completion rates by incorporating gamification elements (challenges, badges, leaderboards)
Learners can design sustainable energy selection strategies through a weekly energy consumption simulation game
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
